doc.title: Karl's in a Coma
doc.plot: Dark comedy takes a poignant look at the nature of people faced with the trauma of a loved one. Karl is visited by family and friends while in a comatose state in the hospital. His boss, Manny, apologizes for lying to him, taking advantage of him, saying bad things behind his back to other people. His parents apologize for trying to bribe Karl to take sides during their divorce. His girlfriend, Sharon apologizes for being mean to him, making him take her out to places he cannot afford, and yelling at him during sex. But are they really sorry? And what about Karl?
